item.title: Node-Modules configuration options with pnpm
item.description: There are many ways to create a nodemodules directory. Your goal must be to create the most strict one but if that is not possible, there are options to make a loose nodemodules as well.

item.title: Düz, klasik node_modules yapısı artık tek yol değil
item.guid: Düz, klasik node_modules yapısı artık tek yol değil
item.description: New users of pnpm frequently ask me about the weird structure of node_modules that pnpm creates. Why is it not flat? Where are all the sub-dependencies?
